content: Hey @Jack Wrenn or others! Sorry for the late notice, but any chance you can post an update as a comment on rust-lang/lang-team#21 sometime before the lang-team planning meeting tomorrow? Here are some prompts and questions.
cc @Josh Triplett or @rylev, not sure who is presently leading here
Hey folks! Could somebody post an update on https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/21 for the monthly lang team planning meeting?
